name: Lone Recorder
description:
A puzzle-platformer where you record your inputs and replay them on time clones to synchronize with your past self!Made in 12 days for the Major Jam: Isolation

If you get stuck and REALLY want to skip a level you can hold Enter/Return (or right stick button) for 5 seconds.

I did everything during the jam except the music and some basic code for functionality i had lying around

All Music is Creative Commons, by Nosoapradio.us (http://nosoapradio.us)
